timeline.bodyText: Since we no longer use ExtImpRubicon as a type for map keys, we should rename the map to something like impToImpExt. Please correct other cases as well.
timeline.author: RossGoncharuk

timeline.bodyText: Please remove an extra blank line after last variable declaration. There should be an empty line after last symbol in each .java class, which in 99% cases is a closing curly bracket of the class.
timeline.author: RossGoncharuk

timeline.bodyText: This annotation is redundant, since if it is missing Jason will resolve camel case naming (typical Java variable name) into snake case - which is going to be exactly is_rewarded_inventory. So you can skip the annotation when variable name is resolved as expected .json property name.
timeline.author: RossGoncharuk

timeline.bodyText:
Please add a //given inline commentary for a block of test where you declare variables or set up stubs.
Check other missing cases. Thanks!
timeline.author: RossGoncharuk

timeline.bodyText: Please, inline this variable since it is needed only for video impression.

timeline.bodyText:
This seems like a hack. What if you'll need to add another field?
Please, use @Builder instead of @AllArgsConstructor.
PS. Usually, we use builder for models having more then 3 fields.

Please, use plaing rewarded string where needed.

Minor. For better readability maybe it make sense to split ExtPrebid ext into 2 separate arguments: ExtImpPrebid extImpPrebid and ExtImpRubicon extImpRubicon.
What do you think?
